attributes.action: 99 year old Tom Moore raised over £12 million for the NHS
attributes.additional_details: this war vetern has raised over £12 mill for the NHS
attributes.background: give him a knighthood, even if it is done online, he will be 100 soon..

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
